text:
Hi Nikki

Thank you for the information you have given me. I will look into the link that you've sent me. I hope this link would help me on my project because I've been trying at different softwares but most of them doesn't work or seem very useful. Also, I am looking to do an apprenticeship at a animation company. If possible, could you please send me the short film you were involved in. 

Look forward to hearing from you.

Regards,
Nathanael Christopher
